data: Read in English Teach AP Computer Science Principles with the Microsoft MakeCode curriculum Module 11 Units Feedback Intermediate K-12 Educator School Leader Microsoft MakeCode Educators learn about the curriculum framework of the AP Computer Science Principles course and how the Microsoft MakeCode curriculum meets the course's curricular goals. Learning objectives Upon completion of this module, you'll be able to: Describe the AP Computer Science Principles course. Identify the key components of the AP Computer Science Principles curriculum framework. Explain the goals of the Microsoft MakeCode curriculum. Describe the Microsoft MakeCode curriculum. Create a plan to encourage diversity in the AP Computer Science Principles class. Add Prerequisites None Introduction min Introduction to AP Computer Science Principles min Importance of teaching computer science in high school min Overview of AP Computer Science Principles min Goals of the Microsoft MakeCode curriculum min Offerings in the Microsoft MakeCode curriculum min Service learning in the Microsoft MakeCode curriculum min Promote diversity in your AP Computer Science Principles class min Call to action min Module assessment min Summary min Take the module assessment Module Assessment Results Assess your understanding of this module. Sign in and answer all questions correctly to earn a pass designation on your profile. Start
